PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-15782010-12-09HEALTH,  ,  ,  , 
ActHazardous Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Hazardous Products (Toys) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS (TOYS) REGULATIONS to add ''a phthalate referred to in the phthalates Regulations'' to the list of substances that are excluded from the allowance to be present in a plastic material at a concentration of 1% or less in toys, equipment and other products for use by a child under three years of age in learning or play.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0299 Publication Date: 2010-12-22
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Hazardous Products (Toys) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS (TOYS) REGULATIONS to add ''a phthalate referred to in the phthalates Regulations'' to the list of substances that are excluded from the allowance to be present in a plastic material at a concentration of 1% or less in toys, equipment and other products for use by a child under three years of age in learning or play.
